translation.en: This is your last chance
to stop something very unpleasant from happening.
translation.fr: d'empêcher qu'il arrive une chose fâcheuse.

translation.en: Wanna tell us where you hid the extra, Lyle?
translation.fr: Dis-nous où t'as caché le reste, Lyle.

translation.en: Eli, I'm sorry, mate.
Talk to me, Lyle!
I'm sorry, Frankie.
Get him outta here.
- - Lyle! Lyle! Lyle! Lyle!
Little shit.
No, no, no! Stop hitting me!
- Call the police, somebody! - Come on!
Somebody call the cops!
Don't put me in the fucking trunk! - Shut up! - Put me in the back seat!
translation.fr: Non pas dans le coffre, putain ! Mettez-moi à l'arrière !

translation.en: Get in! Shit.
I love you, Frankie!
Shut up!
No, no, no, no…
Don't fuck with Ivan Kroll, ya fuckin' idiot.
translation.fr: On fait pas chier Ivan Kroll, petite merde.

translation.en: What the fuck?
Fuckin'…
Wait!
You know, life is really different when you grow up in a family of outlaws.
translation.fr: La vie est différente quand on grandit dans une famille de hors-la-loi.

translation.en: But even in a town like Darra,
you still have school, homework, and doing what grown- ups say.
translation.fr: il y a l'école, les devoirs, et on doit obéir aux adultes.

translation.en: Although I reckon grown- ups can get confused,
translation.fr: Mais les adultes peuvent se tromper

translation.en: to make the kind of bad decisions that land them in jail.
translation.fr: et prendre des décisions qui les envoient en tôle.

translation.en: Boys, wake up.
Slim'll be here soon.
Wake up.
So I need to help my mum and stepdad avoid making those mistakes again,
translation.fr: J'aide ma mère et mon beau-père à ne pas reproduire ces erreurs

translation.en: and stay on the straight and narrow.
translation.fr: et à rester dans le droit chemin.

translation.en: - Mum, mum! Guess what! - What?
Slim's gonna let me go down the main road this time.
translation.fr: Slim me laisse prendre la route principale.

translation.en: - Well, I trust you. -
And he reckons I'm a much better driver than Lyle.
translation.fr: Il dit que je conduis mieux que Lyle.

translation.en: What you makin'?
You know, I'm not entirely sure yet. Maybe ask me later.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas trop. Redemande-moi plus tard.

translation.en: Looks good though.
Thanks.
Our mum really is the best in the world.
translation.fr: Notre mère est la meilleure des mamans.

translation.en: She's always tryin' to do what's best for me and my brother Gus,
translation.fr: Elle fait au mieux pour moi et mon frère Gus.

translation.en: and we're tryin' to get the best for her.
translation.fr: Et on fait au mieux pour elle.

translation.en: Her only fault is being too trusting of people, but I'm not sure that's a fault.
translation.fr: Son défaut : trop faire confiance. Mais c'est pas vraiment un défaut.

translation.en: Reckon the little fella wants to drive, eh?
translation.fr: Le petit veut prendre le volant ?

translation.en: The idea of writing this letter actually came from Slim Halliday,
translation.fr: L'idée d'écrire cette lettre vient de Slim Halliday.

translation.en: who you'd know from when he was in Boggo Road Gaol for murder.
translation.fr: Tombé pour meurtre à la prison de Boggo Road.

translation.en: Our step- dad Lyle met Slim in prison as well,
translation.fr: Notre beau-père, Lyle, l'a aussi connu en prison.

translation.en: and these days, we call Slim our babysitter.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, on appelle Slim notre baby-sitter.

translation.en: Come on, budge up, then.
You all right? What's Gus writin'?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Il écrit quoi, Gus ?

translation.en: A lot of what my brother writes comes true eventually.
translation.fr: Beaucoup de ce qu'écrit mon frère finit par arriver.

translation.en: He's probably the smartest person in the whole of Australia.
translation.fr: Il est sûrement le plus intelligent d'Australie.

translation.en: But he hasn't actually spoken since he was seven years old.
translation.fr: Mais il n'a pas parlé depuis l'âge de sept ans.

translation.en: Your end is a dead blue wren.
translation.fr: Ta fin est un passereau bleu mort.

translation.en: Your what?
I dunno. None of it makes sense till after it's happened.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. On ne comprend que quand ça arrive.

translation.en: Okay, let's get goin'.
Remember what I told ya. Clutch in, ignition on.
Okay. Okay. Up into first.
- - And then stead'ly on the peddly.
Like that.
Hey, come on.
- Let's get on the road. - Hey!
- You’re doing well, eh. - Oh!
That's it, hold it.
Jesus Christ!
Yep. Now you're drivin'.
So I started writing to Alex Bermuda.
translation.fr: J'ai commencé à écrire à Alex Bermuda.

translation.en: Like you said, he's only got four more years in prison if he keeps out of trouble.
translation.fr: Il n'a plus que quatre ans à tirer s'il évite les ennuis.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's a big if.  Is it really boring in prison?
translation.fr: - C'est un grand si. - On s'ennuie tant que ça, en prison ?

translation.en: 'Cause I was wondering how you lasted 25 years.
translation.fr: Je me demande comment t'as tenu 25 ans.

translation.en: Learn to fucking drive!
One thing you learn is how to master time.
Slow it all down by focusing on the details
translation.fr: Le ralentir pour voir les détails.

translation.en: or you can speed it up by being so busy, not enough hours in the day.
translation.fr: L'accélérer pour s'occuper jusqu'à manquer d'heures.

translation.en: Busy with what?
Collecting cockroach shit, so you can sign your name with it.
translation.fr: Récupérer des merdes de cafard et écrire ton nom avec.

translation.en: Make your bed, read some chapters of your book,
translation.fr: Faire son lit, lire un livre.

translation.en: play yourself at chess, then play the winner.
translation.fr: Jouer contre soi aux échecs et prendre le gagnant.

translation.en: Go fishin' in your mind, down off Redcliffe Jetty.
translation.fr: Pêcher dans sa tête, sur la jetée de Redcliffe.

translation.en: Catch a big bloody flathead, cook it,
translation.fr: Prendre une belle sole, la cuisiner,

translation.en: watch the sun go down.
- Brake. - Do what?
Brake!
Now you know what give way means.
translation.fr: T'as appris à céder le passage.

translation.en: Okay. Gear stick into neutral.
Ignition on.
Stead'ly on the peddly.
According to Slim, staying on the right side of the law is just like driving.
translation.fr: Pour Slim, rester dans le droit chemin, c'est comme conduire.

translation.en: Stead'ly on the peddly.
Lyle!
Lyle, did you see me driving?
I was full- on driving!
Yeah, mate. Hey. You'll make a bloody good driver one day, you will.
translation.fr: Oui, mon grand, tu seras un super conducteur un jour.

translation.en: - Better driver than you, mate. - Right- o, Slim.
translation.fr: - Meilleur que toi. - Tu l'as dit, Slim.

translation.en: Cheers.
Hey, mate, what you got on tonight?
Frankie, she's doing her Jane Fonda class,
and I got a few things I gotta take care of.
Wondering if you could, uh, keep an eye on the rugrats.
translation.fr: Tu peux rester garder les gosses ?

translation.en: Make sure they do their homework, you know?
Yeah, anytime.
Good on you, mate.
Hey, bugalugs.
Did you thank him?
- Oh! Cheers, Slim! - Yeah, bit bloody late now.
translation.fr: - Merci, Slim ! - C'est un peu tard.

translation.en: Mum, I drove all the way down to the cement factory.
translation.fr: Maman, j'ai conduit jusqu'à l'usine de ciment.

translation.en: And I learned to give way.  Hey, slow down.
translation.fr: - J'ai appris à céder le passage. - Hé, pas si vite.

translation.en: Wipe your feet. Stop running.
translation.fr: Essuie tes pieds. Ne cours pas.

translation.en: Closer to home, the Brisbane drug wars take a grisly turn.
translation.fr: À Brisbane, la lutte contre la drogue a pris un tournant macabre.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies from the Courier Mail has been following the story.
translation.fr: Caitlyn Spies, du Courier-Mail, nous en dit plus.

translation.en: All we know so far is that the body of an unidentified man was found…
translation.fr: Le corps d'un homme non identifié a été retrouvé…

translation.en: Ah, Eli, turn that off.
…on a patch of waste ground near Stapleton,
translation.fr: … sur un terrain vague près de Stapleton.

translation.en: missing his right arm.
translation.fr: Il lui manquait le bras droit.

translation.en: Police have linked the killing to the ongoing conflict between rival Asian drug gangs,
translation.fr: La police lie le meurtre à la guerre entre deux gangs asiatiques rivaux.

translation.en: and are asking anyone with any information to please come forward.
translation.fr: Toute personne ayant des informations est priée de se manifester.

translation.en: - Mum! - It's just the news, Eli.
That was Caitlyn Spies.
I don't care if it was Mikhail Gorbachev. Do your homework.
translation.fr: Elle ou Mikhaïl Gorbatchev, je m'en fiche. Fais tes devoirs.

translation.en: Oh, shut up.
Boys, stop!
Eli, stop!
Lyle and I are going out later. Slim's babysitting.
translation.fr: On sort avec Lyle, ce soir. Slim viendra vous garder.

translation.en: Out where?
To the cinema.
Hey, Slim, you're in the paper.
Yeah, I saw that.
- Is that the guy who put you away? - Corrupt psycho that he was.
translation.fr: - C'est le gars qui t'a mis en tôle ? - Un taré corrompu.

translation.en: So, did you actually kill that taxi driver, or didn't you?
translation.fr: T'as vraiment tué ce chauffeur de taxi ou pas ?

translation.en: What do you think?
I dunno. I don't think you're a violent person.
translation.fr: Je pense pas que tu sois violent.

translation.en: Never underestimate what any man is capable of.
translation.fr: Ne sous-estime jamais ce dont un homme est capable.

translation.en: So do you think Lyle's gone back to dealing smack?
translation.fr: Lyle s'est remis à dealer de l'héro ?

translation.en: I dunno. Why don't you ask him?
translation.fr: J'en sais rien. T'as qu'à lui demander.

translation.en: I didn't wanna put him on the spot.
He's doing his best, I suppose.
translation.fr: Il fait de son mieux, j'imagine.

translation.en: You're a good kid.
You reckon?
You just, you know, keep your nose clean, stay out of trouble.
translation.fr: Tiens-toi à carreau, évite les ennuis.

translation.en: And you let Lyle deal with his own shit.
translation.fr: Et te mêle pas des emmerdes de Lyle.

translation.en: Dear Alex.
There's a lot that goes unsaid in our kind of family,
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de non-dits dans notre famille.

translation.en: either from trying to protect each other or just normal head- in- the- sand kind of stuff.
translation.fr: Soit parce qu'on veut se protéger, soit parce qu'on fait l'autruche.

translation.en: I'd be interested to see where you stand between saying too much or saying too little.
translation.fr: Entre en dire trop ou pas assez, c'est quoi, le mieux ?

translation.en: Strikes me that both can end really badly.
translation.fr: Dans les deux cas, ça peut mal finir.

translation.en: Dear Eli, greetings from your pal Alex Bermuda
translation.fr: Cher Eli, bien le bonjour de ton pote Alex Bermuda

translation.en: and the boys in B16.
translation.fr: et des gars du bloc B16.

translation.en: Still can't get over you knowing Slim Halliday.
translation.fr: Tu connais Slim Halliday. J'en reviens pas.

translation.en: What a legend that man is.
In regards to getting involved in things outside of your control,
translation.fr: Pour ce qui est de s'impliquer dans ce que tu contrôles pas,

translation.en: I've had a fair while to consider this myself.
translation.fr: j'ai eu le temps d'y réfléchir.

translation.en: We're all social beings, it's natural to wanna pitch in for your mates.
translation.fr: On est des êtres sociaux. On veut aider nos potes.

translation.en: But then, a lot of bad decisions are made emotionally in the heat of the moment.
translation.fr: Mais dans le feu de l'action, on fait de mauvais choix.

translation.en: Case in point, the screws took our TV the other day for some minor misdemeanor,
translation.fr: Un exemple. Les matons ont confisqué notre télé pour une broutille.

translation.en: and the result was pretty untidy.
translation.fr: Ça a causé un beau bazar.

translation.en: Like sands in the hourglass,
translation.fr: Comme le sable dans le sablier,

translation.en: so are the days of our lives.
translation.fr: s'écoulent les jours de nos vies.

translation.en: You can take a con's freedom,
translation.fr: Un taulard, tu peux lui prendre sa liberté,

translation.en: take his rights, take his humanity,
but for God's sake,
don't take his Days of Our Lives.
translation.fr: pas Des jours et des vies.

translation.en: I have to check on the kids.
They're fine. Shh.
So, what was the movie?
The one you were at last night.
translation.fr: Que vous avez vu hier soir ?

translation.en: Oh yeah, it was good.
Terms of Endearment.
So, what's it about?
It's a love story.
- Does it have a happy ending? - Mm, happy and sad.
translation.fr: - Ça finit bien ? - Bien et mal.

translation.en: Eat your breakfast.
Hey, so my boss says it's all right to bring your kids to work, you know,
translation.fr: Mon boss a dit oui pour emmener nos enfants au boulot.

translation.en: for the show and tell at school. Good news, eh?
translation.fr: Pour raconter à l'école. Sympa, non ?

translation.en: Only problem is we're not your kids.
translation.fr: Sauf qu'on est pas tes enfants.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's also bring an annoying little squirt to work day,
translation.fr: On doit amener des sales gosses au boulot.

translation.en: so I reckon you both qualify. Hm…
So, what did you think of the film last night?
- What'd we-- - Terms of Endearment.
Terms of Endearment.
Yeah, it was a real good one.
Real chick flick. - Mm- hmm. - Ask your mum about it.
translation.fr: Un film pour nanas. Demande à ta mère.

translation.en: - Hey? - Mm- hmm?
Where's my bloody, um-- Oh, thank you.
And me--
You're the best. Mwah!
All right, I'm offski. Have a good day at school, boys.
translation.fr: Bon, je file. Amusez-vous bien à l'école.

translation.en: You do know that's not physically possible, right?
Yeah, well, that is why it's the best preparation for life, mate.
translation.fr: Donc, c'est la meilleure façon de se préparer à la vie.

translation.en: Do you think he's dealing again?
translation.fr: Il s'est remis à dealer, tu crois ?

translation.en: 'Cause I think he's dealing again.
Yeah, well, not if she ends up on smack again.
translation.fr: Pas si elle replonge dans l'héro.

translation.en: Wanna take the shortcut?
Rack off, Astro Boy! This is our spot.
translation.fr: Dégage, Astro Boy ! C'est chez nous, ici.

translation.en: Come on, Gus. Just leave it.
Yeah, go on, then.
Gus, is it? We haven't met before.
translation.fr: Gus, c'est ça ? Enchantée. Poppy Birkbeck, conseillère d'orientation. Assieds-toi.

translation.en: I'm Poppy Birkbeck, the guidance counselor. Take a seat.
translation.fr: Enchantée. Poppy Birkbeck, conseillère d'orientation. Assieds-toi.

translation.en: I have to say,
you've certainly given my predecessors plenty to think about.
translation.fr: que tu as donné à réfléchir à mes prédécesseurs.

translation.en: I mean, everyone's agreed, there's nothing wrong with you physically.
translation.fr: Physiquement, tout va bien chez toi.

translation.en: Hearing's perfect,
and obviously nothing wrong with your brain,
judging by your academic record.
translation.fr: si l'on en croit tes résultats.

translation.en: So… it's just the speaking we have a problem with.
translation.fr: Le seul problème, c'est que tu ne parles pas.

translation.en: Wonder if your artworks tell us something.
translation.fr: Voyons si tes dessins nous disent quelque chose.

translation.en: This was your still life.
And this was your still life with flowers.
translation.fr: Ta nature morte avec des fleurs.

translation.en: And a lot of these pictures have
this car in there.
Family group, Last Wave.
translation.fr: Une famille, un dernier au revoir.

translation.en: Those kids in the back.
Is that you and your brother?
Heading where?
If you can't say it, write it.
translation.fr: Écris, si tu ne peux pas le dire.

translation.en: Or… draw it.
I know it may seem pointless, Gus,
translation.fr: Ça a l'air inutile, je sais.

translation.en: but I believe you and your brother have enormous potential,
translation.fr: Mais ton frère et toi, vous avez un gros potentiel.

translation.en: were it not for some past trauma.
It could be your mother's addiction, her leaving your father,
translation.fr: L'addiction de ta mère ? Le fait qu'elle ait quitté ton père ?

translation.en: or something else you've decided to keep quiet about,
translation.fr: Ou autre chose que tu refuses de dire,

translation.en: in belief that silence will protect you.
translation.fr: pensant que le silence te protégera.

translation.en: Or someone.
And I'm here to say that silence rarely does that.
translation.fr: Mais crois-moi, le silence protège rarement.

translation.en: Usually makes it worse.
Draw me what you're hiding, Gus.
translation.fr: Dessine-moi ce que tu caches, Gus.

translation.en: Hey, Tinker Bell.
Darren wants you at the back of the science lab.
translation.fr: Darren t'appelle à l'arrière du labo.

translation.en: Everything all right, Gus?
Hey. What's happening?
Hold out your hands and close your eyes.
translation.fr: Tends les mains et ferme les yeux.

translation.en: He said hold out your hands. You brain- damaged or something?
translation.fr: Allez, tends tes mains ! T'as un problème au cerveau ?

translation.en: Oh, fuckin' hell!
- I need you to hold him. - Do what you're told, bellend.
You need to stretch him out more. One hand on his neck, one on his tail.
translation.fr: Étire-le plus. Une main sur son cou, une sur sa queue.

translation.en: On the bin.
Tighter on his tail. You need to wrap your fist around it.
translation.fr: Serre plus la queue. Enroule ton poing autour.

translation.en: What are you gonna-- Jesus, fuck!
It's my grandfather's. Samurai steel.
translation.fr: Il est à mon grand-père. Fait en acier de samouraï.

translation.en: You're from Vietnam, Darren.
There is no way you're descended from a samurai.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas descendre d'un samouraï.

translation.en: Well, my friend, that's what we're about to find out.
translation.fr: Eh bien, mon ami, c'est ce qu'on va découvrir.

translation.en: Oh, for Christ's sake.
Don't piss your pants, I've practiced this.
translation.fr: Pisse pas dans ton froc, je me suis entraîné.

translation.en: Stay really still, and nothing bad will happen.
translation.fr: Bouge pas et y aura pas de dégâts.

translation.en: Darren, this is nuts.
The mind's eye sees everything.
You'll hit my head or cut off one of my hands.
translation.fr: Tu vas toucher ma tête ou ma main !

translation.en: - The true warrior does not waver. - They'll put you in juvie!
translation.fr: - Un guerrier ne faiblit pas. - Tu vas finir en taule !

translation.en: Oi! What are you students doing?
What the bloody hell is going on here?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui se passe ici, bon sang ?

translation.en: Those lab rats are school property.
Come with me, pal.
So answer me this, Eli Bell.
In a country such as ours, blessed as it is with natural advantages,
translation.fr: Dans un pays comme le nôtre, avec ses nombreux avantages,

translation.en: why our young folks should be so drawn to crime and petty misdemeanors?
translation.fr: pourquoi les jeunes sont attirés par le crime et la délinquance ?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know, sir, but I-- I personally blame a lack of physical exercise.
translation.fr: - Je sais pas, monsieur… - À cause du manque d'exercice physique.

translation.en: What were your friends doing behind the science block in the first place?
translation.fr: Que faisaient tes amis derrière le labo ?

translation.en: Smoking?
Playing with yourselves?
Oh, they're not my friends, sir. I was--
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas mes amis, monsieur, j'étais…

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Eli. You're really not very good at it.
translation.fr: Ne me mens pas, Eli. Tu n'es vraiment pas doué pour ça.

translation.en: Who else was with you?
Oh, uh, they could've been from outside the school, actually.
translation.fr: Ils étaient peut-être pas de l'école.

translation.en: One was big and fat and the other was a little Vietnamese guy.
translation.fr: Un gros et un petit vietnamien.

translation.en: Yes, well, that's a fair description of half of my PE class.
translation.fr: Tu décris la moitié des élèves de mon cours d'EPS.

translation.en: I'm gonna need names.
Drop your strides.
Uh, my-- my what, sir?
Your shorts, off.
All right, now bend over.
Come on! Bend over.
I'm not gonna tell you it won't hurt, 'cause hurting is the point.
translation.fr: Ça va faire mal. C'est le but.

translation.en: Punishment will cease when you tell me the name of your co- conspirators.
translation.fr: J'arrêterai quand tu me donneras le nom de tes coconspirateurs.

translation.en: Mm, my what, sir?
Why does no one speak English? Your partners in crime.
translation.fr: Je parle clairement, pourtant. Tes complices.

translation.en: - Your associates! - Ah! Jesus.
Jesus, I'm quite convinced,
- was neither fat nor Vietnamese. -
translation.fr: que c'était ni Gros ni Vietnamien.

translation.en: Do we have a name yet?
Regarding on how to deal with bullies, you really only have two options.
translation.fr: Pour faire face aux harceleurs, tu n'as que deux options.

translation.en: Either keep out of their way or take matters into your own hands.
translation.fr: Soit s'éloigner de leur chemin, soit prendre les choses en main.

translation.en: Problem with option two being you never know how that's all going to end.
translation.fr: Le problème avec la 2e option, c'est qu'on sait jamais comment ça finit.

translation.en: So the closer I get to being released, the more I adhere to the prisoner's code.
translation.fr: Plus je me rapproche de ma libération, plus j'adhère au code des prisonniers.

translation.en: Stay out of it,
don't rat on mates,
keep your trap shut.
Your silence is admirable, but it's misguided.
translation.fr: J'admire ton silence, mais il est malavisé.

translation.en: I already know the answer, I just wanna hear you say it.
translation.fr: Je connais déjà la réponse. Je veux l'entendre de ta bouche.

translation.en: Very well.
Mum, Lyle?
Mum?
Gus, we shouldn't.
Lyle'll kill us if he finds us in here.
translation.fr: Lyle nous tuera s'il nous trouve ici.

translation.en: Gus, we can't!
translation.fr: Gus, on a pas le droit !

translation.en: No one's been here since the thing with Mum.
translation.fr: On vient plus là depuis l'histoire avec maman.

translation.en: Come back.
- What are we supposed to do with Mum? - Sorry, mate.
translation.fr: - On fait quoi, avec maman ? - Désolé.

translation.en: - Lyle! - I'll be back, I-- I promise.
Lyle!
I gotta get myself straightened out. I'll be back, I promise, mate.
translation.fr: Je dois me reprendre en mains. Je reviendrai, promis.

translation.en: I'm sorry, mate!
Lyle!
Gus!
Gus, Lyle's back!
- Lyle! - Hey!
Hello, mate!
Let me look at you.
How's Frankie? Still pretty bad.
All right, let's go get her sorted.
Boys, boys, boys, boys…
Boys! Boys!
You fucking arsehole! Fuck!
You're a fucking pig! Fuck!
I fucking hate you!
Boys, help me! Boys!
Don't do this to me. Don't do this to me.
- Please. - Boys, it's gonna be all right.
translation.fr: - Je vous en supplie. - Ça va aller.

translation.en: Boys. Boys.
I know you can fucking hear me!
translation.fr: Je sais que vous m'entendez, putain !

translation.en: Fuck you! Fuck you all!
Fuck! Fuck you!
How did you know about this?
This is insane.
For what? What are we waiting for?
Don't answer it!
- Eli? - Who is this?
I'll give you three guesses.
No idea. Is this Alex?
There's a million Alexes.
He's my pen friend, doing time in Boggo Road Gaol. Slim introduced us.
translation.fr: Mon ami à la prison de Boggo Road. Slim nous a présentés.

translation.en: I guess any friend of the taxi driver killer…
translation.fr: Un ami du tueur du chauffeur de taxi.

translation.en: He didn't kill that guy!
If Slim's your babysitter, he'd have to say that.
translation.fr: Slim est ton baby-sitter. Normal qu'il dise ça.

translation.en: My mum said he didn't, and my mum's not capable of lying.
translation.fr: C'est ma mère qui le dit. Elle ment jamais.

translation.en: Everybody lies, the saints and the sinners.
translation.fr: Tout le monde ment. Les saints comme les pécheurs.

translation.en: The trick is knowing which one you're talking to. Good luck, Eli.
translation.fr: Faut juste savoir à qui on parle. Bonne chance, Eli.

translation.en: You two better not be down there.
translation.fr: Vous avez pas intérêt à être en bas.

translation.en: Oh, no! Come on, Gus.
Oi! You little mongrels, get back up here right now!
translation.fr: Salopiauds, venez ici tout de suite !

translation.en: - Go, Gus! - Don't you do that, Gus! Gus!
- Eli! - Go, Gus, move!
Get up here right now, you two little mongrels!
What's happening? The fucking kids are in the emergency tunnel!
translation.fr: - Il se passe quoi ? - Ils sont dans le tunnel d'urgence !

translation.en: Right, boys, this is it. You're in big shit.
translation.fr: Gagné ! Vous êtes dans la merde jusqu'au cou !

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
Ugh. If they don't bury themselves alive, I'll fuckin' murder 'em.
translation.fr: S'ils s'enterrent pas vivants, je vais les tuer.

translation.en: Lyle, go easy on them.
Gus, wait for me!
Gus! Gus!
Gus, I'm stuck! Gus, come back.
Uh, just make sure they're safe, will ya?
Something-- It smells like poo!
Where are we?
You're right where you belong, you little wankers.
You're very lucky you both weren't buried alive.
translation.fr: Vous auriez pu être enterrés vivants.

translation.en: Now come on out.
- Rack off. You'll give us a floggin'. - Dead fuckin' right, I am, mate.
translation.fr: - Pour que tu nous battes ? - Putain, ça, c'est sûr.

translation.en: - Well, fuck that, then. - Don't swear!
- You just did. - Yeah, well, I'm an adult, aren't I?
translation.fr: - Toi, tu le fais. - Je suis un adulte !

translation.en: You tell me, Lyle. I thought adults were supposed to learn from their mistakes.
translation.fr: Ah bon ? Pourtant, les adultes apprennent de leurs erreurs.

translation.en: You and Mum are dealing again. It's the truth, innit?
translation.fr: Mais maman et toi, vous dealez à nouveau.

translation.en: Just announce it to the whole bloody neighborhood, won't you?
translation.fr: Annonce-le à tout le quartier, tant que t'y es.

translation.en: Here. Now, get a hold of that before you both get bloody polio or hepatitis.
translation.fr: Attrapez ça avant de choper la polio ou l'hépatite.

translation.en: Fuck you, Lyle. We spoke to that bloke on the phone.
translation.fr: Va te faire foutre. On a parlé au mec au téléphone.

translation.en: - How come he knows my name? - What bloke?
translation.fr: - Comment il connaît mon nom ? - Un mec ?

translation.en: There's no bloke on the phone. It's not even connected!
translation.fr: Y avait personne. Il est même pas branché !

translation.en: Me and Gus deserve some answers!
translation.fr: Gus et moi, on mérite des réponses !

translation.en: You know what? You deserve to stay down there
translation.fr: Non, vous méritez de rester là

translation.en: until you, little man, learn some bloody manners.
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce que tu apprennes les bonnes manières, petit.

translation.en: Has Lyle got Mum using again?
Fucking Lyle.
Eli!
Eli!
Just let her rant and rage, okay, boys?
I know it's difficult, but we just gotta wait around, okay?
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est difficile, mais faut qu'on attende.

translation.en: He's tryin' to kill me, Eli.
Call the cops! He's tryin' to kill me.
translation.fr: Appelle les flics ! Il veut me tuer.

translation.en: Call them and tell he's gonna murder me.
translation.fr: Appelle-les et dis qu'il va me tuer.

translation.en: Eli.
You can't help her, mate.
Hey.
Group…
Group hug.
You think he's gone out yet?
I'm sorry, Frankie.
Pretty crappy at this dad stuff.
No.
You're great, Lyle.
We'd have been up shit creek without a paddle if you hadn't given us a home.
translation.fr: On serait bien dans la merde si tu nous avais pas donné un foyer.

translation.en: - Not much of a home though, is it? - Yes, it is.
translation.fr: - C'est pas vraiment un foyer. - Si.

translation.en: The boys worship you.
And I kinda like you too.
Come on, give me a leg up. Come on, Gus…
Don't, Gus! I'm falling!
Gus!
Come on, Gus, push!
Ah, where are the bloody buttons on this thing?
You boys learned your lesson?
Is Lyle still mad at us?
Yeah, no, he's settled. He's watching the footy.
translation.fr: Il s'est calmé, il regarde le foot.

translation.en: So he's not gonna flog us?
Not if you say you're sorry.
Act of having it off, ten letters.
translation.fr: Acte de couper, en dix lettres.

translation.en: Something, something, P, something, T.
translation.fr: Avec les lettres P et T.

translation.en: - Mum. - Mm?
Just promise you and Lyle aren't using again.
translation.fr: Promets-moi de ne plus vous droguer.

translation.en: I promise.
Family embrace, five and three.
translation.fr: Étreinte en famille, huit et sept.

translation.en: Excuse me.
- - Good night.
Why did you run away from our dad?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu as fui notre père ?

translation.en: Eli, it's late. I don't wanna talk about Robert right now.
translation.fr: Eli, il est tard. J'ai pas envie de parler de Robert.

translation.en: He did bad things, didn't he?
translation.fr: Il a fait des trucs pas bien ?

translation.en: We all do bad things sometimes.
translation.fr: On fait tous des trucs pas bien.

translation.en: Alcoholism is a disease.
He wasn't a well man.
Was he a good man?
He was a good dancer.
- Was he more like me or more like Gus? - I don't know, Eli.
translation.fr: - Il était plus comme moi ou comme Gus ? - Je sais pas.

translation.en: He was… like both of you.
translation.fr: Il était comme tous les deux.

translation.en: Was he scary sometimes?
Like Gus is scary.
Gus isn't scary. Yes, he is.
Yeah? In what way?
I dunno. It's the stuff he writes in the air with his magic finger.
translation.fr: Je sais pas, il écrit des trucs dans l'air avec son doigt magique.

translation.en: It's like he can hop forwards through time and send back messages from the future.
translation.fr: Comme s'il pouvait remonter le temps et envoyer des messages du futur.

translation.en: Maybe he can.
You ever considered that possibility?
All I know is that boy loves you more than he can say.
translation.fr: En tout cas, il t'aime plus qu'il ne peut le dire.

translation.en: When you were born, he guarded your crib like all human life depended on it.
translation.fr: Quand tu es né, il a gardé ton berceau comme si toute vie en dépendait.

translation.en: He's the best friend you'll ever have.
translation.fr: Tu n'auras jamais de meilleur ami.

translation.en: And you're the best mum.
translation.fr: Et toi, t'es la meilleure des mamans.

translation.en: Nah.
Probably a bit below average, but that's very kind of you to say.
translation.fr: Je suis en dessous de la moyenne, mais c'est gentil.

translation.en: No, really, you're too good for this shitty place.
translation.fr: Non, t'es trop bien pour cet endroit pourri.

translation.en: You were too good for Dad, and now you're too good for Lyle.
translation.fr: T'étais trop bien pour papa, et pour Lyle.

translation.en: Don't.
You could've been a teacher or a school counselor,
translation.fr: T'aurais pu être enseignante, conseillère d'éducation.

translation.en: not living with some drop- kick heroin pusher.
translation.fr: - Et pas finir avec un dealer d'héro. - Ça suffit.

translation.en: That's enough. Go to bed.
translation.fr: - Et pas finir avec un dealer d'héro. - Ça suffit. Va te coucher.

translation.en: I'm going after him.
Check where he goes. You coming?
translation.fr: Voir où il va. Tu viens ?

translation.en: Don't move.
Tink, if you're gonna be a ninja, last thing you wanna wear is blue pajamas with half your arse hangin' out.
translation.fr: Si tu veux être un ninja, porte pas un pyjama bleu avec ton cul qui dépasse.

translation.en: I can see your Aussie white bum flashing on and off like a fuckin' lighthouse.
translation.fr: Ton cul blanc s'allume et s'éteint comme un phare.

translation.en: Hi, Darren.
You know, if I chopped your head off, your brain'd stay alive for three minutes.
translation.fr: Si je te coupe la tête, ton cerveau survivra 3 min.

translation.en: You could carry on talking till you lost all consciousness.
translation.fr: Tu continueras à parler avant de perdre conscience.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Only one way to find out.
translation.fr: Y a qu'un moyen de le savoir.

translation.en: Did you shit yourself?
Almost.
What's Lyle doing here?
I reckon he's collecting heroin from your mum.
translation.fr: Il récupère de l'héroïne chez ta mère.

translation.en: Very good, bellend. Who else knows what he's up to?
translation.fr: Bravo, tête de gland. Qui d'autre le sait ?

translation.en: The guy on the phone, maybe.
What guy on the phone?
There was a guy on the phone. I spoke to him by accident.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé par accident à un gars au téléphone.

translation.en: He seemed to know what was going on.
Could've been Ivan Kroll.
- Who's Ivan Kroll? - Just an arsehole with a motorbike.
translation.fr: - C'est qui, Ivan Kroll ? - Juste un trouduc avec une moto.

translation.en: You see on the news about that bloke who lost an arm? That was probably Ivan's work.
translation.fr: Le gars qui a perdu un bras ? Ivan le lui a sûrement coupé.

translation.en: Wanna eat something?
- I'll be all right. - You better come in.
Be rude not to.
Shoes off, dick wad.
Check this out.
Go on, have a look.
…so much money. It's the best.
So when did Lyle go back to dealing smack?
translation.fr: Il s'est remis quand à dealer ?

translation.en: What makes you think he ever stopped? He just moved up the ladder.
translation.fr: Tu crois qu'il s'était arrêté ? Il a gravi les échelons.

translation.en: Sucks, doesn't it? Thinking you're with the good guys
translation.fr: C'est nul. Tu penses être avec les gentils,

translation.en: and discovering you're the bad guys.
Darren!
- Come, she'd like to meet you. - Oi!
Found this one spying in the yard.
- The one who didn't rat about the rat. - Eli, what are you doin' here?
translation.fr: - Celui qui m'a pas balancé pour le rat. - Eli, tu fais quoi, ici ?

translation.en: Darren invited me.
It's 1:00 in the morning. Go home!
translation.fr: Il est 1 h du mat. Rentre !

translation.en: - 'Kay, I'm going. - You always give up that easy?
Why did you come here?
Because he's an idiot.
- Just followed Lyle. - Mm.
Because?
You have question for him.
translation.fr: Tu as une question pour lui.

translation.en: - Okay, that's enough, guys. - I say when it's enough.
translation.fr: - Ça suffit. - Je dirai quand ça suffira.

translation.en: Okay.
Come here, boy.
Closer.
Why don't you ask Lyle
your most important question?
I'll make sure that he answer truthfully.
translation.fr: Je m'assurerai qu'il réponde avec sincérité.

translation.en: Why are you dealing drugs again?
- For the money, mate. - So why are we still poor?
translation.fr: - Pour le fric. - Alors, pourquoi on est pauvres ?

translation.en: I said one question.
Now it's my turn.
Why didn't you rat on my son?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu n'as pas balancé mon fils ?

translation.en: It's the prisoner's code. Stay out of it, keep your trap shut.
translation.fr: C'est le code des taulards. T'en mêle pas, ferme ton clapet.

translation.en: You taught him well.
translation.fr: Il a été à bonne école.

translation.en: You can both leave now.
Okay.
Bring him back another time.
Maybe we talk about work opportunity.
translation.fr: Pour parler peut-être d'une opportunité d'emploi.

translation.en: Okay, thank you.
Eli?
When he say it just for the money,
translation.fr: Quand il dit que c'est pour l'argent,

translation.en: the money is for your family.
translation.fr: c'est de l'argent pour ta famille.

translation.en: He's doing this because he loves you.
translation.fr: Il fait ça parce qu'il t'aime.

translation.en: Off to bed.
Lyle.
Lyle, come back.
Please, Lyle!
Don't you ever follow me again, you hear?
translation.fr: Ne me suis plus jamais, t'as compris ?

translation.en: - Lyle! Lyle! - That was really embarrassing.
You're embarrassed? Lyle, you're a fucking drug dealer!
translation.fr: Ah ouais ? Lyle, tu vends de la drogue !

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck is it with you and Mum?
translation.fr: Putain, vous foutez quoi, avec maman ?

translation.en: Do your homework! Eat your broccoli! Tidy the kitchen!
translation.fr: Fais tes devoirs ! Mange tes brocolis ! Range la cuisine !

translation.en: I mean, like, Mum's an addict, and you're the idiot who got her hooked!
translation.fr: Maman est une toxico, et c'est toi, l'abruti qui l'a rendue accro !

translation.en: Righto, come on, let's go, mate.
Oh, what-- Get up, Eli. What are you doing? Get up.
- Get up! - I can't.
You're just gonna push me down again.
translation.fr: Tu vas encore me pousser par terre !

translation.en: Don't cry, you great big pussy. What are you crying for?
translation.fr: Pleure pas, petite mauviette. Pourquoi tu pleures ?

translation.en: I don't know.
I just got a whole lot of tears inside me.
translation.fr: J'ai plein de larmes en moi.

translation.en: I can't help it.
Here, clean yourself up.
Take it.
Now, I know dealin' smack is a shitty way to make a livin',
translation.fr: Je sais que vendre de l'héro, c'est naze, comme boulot.

translation.en: but no one gets rich doing an honest job anymore.
translation.fr: Mais on ne s'enrichit plus avec un taf honnête.

translation.en: - That's kinda what Darren said. - Oh, did he, now?
translation.fr: - C'est ce que Darren a dit. - Sans déc.

translation.en: Honestly.
Pretty soon, mate, we're gonna be away from this place.
Things are gonna get good, I promise.
Things are gonna get so good you'll forget they were ever bad.
translation.fr: Ça ira si bien que t'oublieras que ça allait mal.

translation.en: You ever wondered why you cry so easily?
translation.fr: Tu sais pourquoi tu pleures si facilement ?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a pussy.
No, because you're a good kid, and don't you ever be ashamed of crying.
translation.fr: Non, parce que t'es un bon garçon. N'aie jamais honte de pleurer.

translation.en: You cry because you give a shit.
People that don't cry, they don't give a shit,
translation.fr: Ceux qui pleurent pas s'en foutent,

translation.en: and God knows there's enough of them fuckwits at large in the world.
translation.fr: et bon Dieu, y a assez de connards comme ça dans le monde.

translation.en: You good?
You done crying?
Yep.
All right, let's go home.
Right, mate, straight to bed, okay?
translation.fr: Allez, mon grand, file au lit.

translation.en: Mum isn't using, but Lyle's dealing like we thought.
translation.fr: Maman se drogue pas. Mais Lyle deale, on avait raison.

translation.en: And Bich Dang offered me a job.
translation.fr: Et Bich Dang m'a proposé un taf.

translation.en: I reckon we can help him.
You know, go into business together, make a shitload of money,
translation.fr: Bosser ensemble. Se faire plein de fric.

translation.en: finally get the cash to move Mum away from here.
translation.fr: Assez pour que maman puisse partir d'ici.

translation.en: What do you reckon?
I'm gonna be dead tomorrow.
This is a test. No test is worth anything unless it's difficult to pass.
translation.fr: C'est un test. Ça vaut rien si on le réussit facilement.

translation.en: And this is yours.
Bobby!
You look how happy your mum is. Why would you want anyone to risk that?
translation.fr: Ta mère est heureuse. Pourquoi risquer de perdre ça ?

translation.en: Robert's your father.
Are you all right, Dad? Whoa!
It's gonna get better, Frankie.
It's gonna get so good you'll forget it was ever bad.
translation.fr: Tout ira bien. T'oublieras que ça allait mal.

translation.en: Ivan Kroll is a bogeyman to keep everyone in line.
translation.fr: Ivan Kroll est un croque-mitaine qui fait peur aux gens.

translation.en: Any word of Lyle?
No, but I'll find him before anything bad happens to him.
translation.fr: Non, je le retrouverai avant qu'il lui arrive malheur.

translation.en: Sometimes bad things happen to get good things.
translation.fr: Parfois, les mauvaises choses mènent à de bonnes.

translation.en: I promise you that our sacred mission has only just begun.
translation.fr: Je vous promets que notre mission sacrée ne fait que commencer.

translation.en: Where's my mum?
Your mum is in prison.
I wanna see my boys!
- Are you real? - It's not a dream, Mum.
translation.fr: - Tu es réel ? - Ce n'est pas un rêve.

translation.en: It's just you and me, Gus. No one's going to help us.
translation.fr: Il n'y a que toi et moi, Gus. Personne nous aidera.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies? I'm Eli Bell.
You and me, we're the daylight.
translation.fr: Toi et moi, on est la lumière du jour.

translation.en: Sending our boys out into the world, it's something to be proud of.
translation.fr: Envoyer ses garçons dans le monde. Y a de quoi être fier.

translation.en: Pain and pleasure's all part of being human.
translation.fr: La douleur et le plaisir, ça nous rend humains.

translation.en: And if it doesn't hurt, not real life, mate.
translation.fr: Si ça fait pas mal, c'est pas réel.

translation.en: All you have to do is believe.
♪ Hope it gets through ♪
